page.title: 04Three Independent Schools
page.content: { S.Gabriel's}is an independent day school,with mostly Church of England pupils, who are{11 to 16 years.}All 130 are girls,with twenty teachers, seven full-time.Classes are very small,about 15 to 20 girls Pupils come from Newbury, Basingstoke, Andover and Hungerford,by car, bus, or coach.All the usual subjects are taught,and{O {levels and some C.S.E. examinations are taken. Two years ago the school added Falkland Junior School, and recently needlework, cookery and science laboratories.In the next few years O. levels will be replaced by the new{G.C.S.E. exam.}Uniform is blue and brown.{Lunch}is provided with choice of hot or cold meals.Most of the girls go on to Sixth Form College or boarding schools,like Bryanston or Marlborough, St.Swithun's and Tudor Hall.
